Save your own custom themes online, and restore them any time you want.
Register a Handcent Online account for free and easily install new themes for your device.
Save your favorite texts online: open a conversation, longpress a message bubble, and select to add it to My Texts.
A library of text messages in various categories such as Funny/Romantic/Birthday. More and more texts will be added.
Save all your personal settings, SMS messages and MMS messages to Handcent\'s secure server and restore them when you need to.

MMS backup will use your SD card to save some backup files. When you restore your saved MMS messages, please confirm that your SD card is working, and that the files at /sdcard/handcent/mmsbackup/ are not corrupted.
Your theme has been successfully submitted to the Handcent team. We will review your theme and it will be released and available in Handcent Themes upon approval!
There are no messages to backup.
View more My Handcent Online services
You aren\'t logged in! Please login with your Handcent Online account or create a new Handcent Online account for free
You aren\'t subscribed to any Handcent Online services! (If you recently subscribed to Handcent Online services, please login first)
Use Handcent\'s special feature to prevent a resend issue that may happen on some devices after rebooting
Handcent Online eCards are beautiful, fullscreen, customizable eCards you can send to your family and friends!
This service is available with VIP or GOLD Memberships only!
You can send full-size pictures, videos, mp3s and other documents to your friends using the Handcent network & SMS.

Search for more Handcent smileys on the Google Play
To save your important messages online: open a conversation, longpress a message bubble, and select the option to save it to your Handcent Box.
When opening the Handcent Box, you will not be required to reaffirm your Handcent login information for your convenience.
You will always be required to reaffirm your Handcent login information when opening the Handcent Box as an added measure of privacy and security.
Changing skins will overwrite your current theme elements such as the backgrounds of conversations and conversation lists. Do you wish to proceed?
Set emoji encoding for your network
Please install Handcent emoji plugin from Google Play first

This option only applies to U.S. residents because U.S. carriers encounter limitations when sending emoji between one another. However, Handcent can send emoji via MMS to iPhone and Android devices that have Handcent SMS installed accompanied by the emoji plugin. If you elect to use SMS, it will only function correctly when you and the recipient are subscribed to the same carrier.
Set default smileys items, if you want to use standard smileys or emoji only
Save your privacy contacts and messages.
Enable popup window to support quick reply.

Keep a copy at public inbox
The privacy messages (including contacts and messages) will be backuped automatic at 2 am every day.

Moved the message into Privacy Box!

Fix popups hidden under the lock screen on some devices using Android 2.2 & or later
Automatically adjust popup so Onscreen Keyboard always displays underneath the edit box. This is best applied to devices with larger-than-average screens.
Allow Onscreen Keyboard to overlap a portion the Edit Box. This is recommended for average and smaller screens.
That group name already exists; please chose new name.
Report Force Close issue reports directly to the Handcent team via email. You can add additional information or just click send. We will reply to you by email.

Report Force Close & Wait (Application Not Responding) issues directly to the Handcent team via email. You can add additional information or just click Send. We will reply to you by email. (NOTE: To send this report, your device needs to be rooted to allow access.)
Having another issue? Report other issues via email by filling out the form below and clicking the send button.
Give suggestions or feature requests to Handcent via email by providing your feedback in the form below and clicking the send button. If applicable, we will respond to you via email.
Display a toast notification when a message is sent from the Privacy Box.
The scheduled time is invalid; please input a valid time.
Automatically delete expired or invalid scheduled tasks.
Set handcent as the default messaging application and entirely disable the stock and other third-party applications for SMS or MMS

Enabling this option will entirely disable the stock messaging and any third-party messaging applications and affirm that Handcent SMS is the default messaging application for your device. This is reversible and you may switch back at any time.
Automatically download \"Handcent MMS+\" files. Depending on usage this may greatly impact your alotted Data Plan so it is not recommended for light, fixed data plans.
You have chosen a high quality file. Do you wish to send it using the Handcent network instead?
Automatically convert high quality pictures, mp3s, and videos to \"Handcent MMS+\",and send it using the Handcent Network.
You have reached the maximum number of records. Please manage your files (Settings->Handcent services->Handcent MMS+) and try again or upgrade to one of our applicable premium services.
Enable additional LED control for rooted devices
Please make sure your device has been rooted and Handcent SMS has been granted root permssion when requested by the Super User app dialog. You may disable this at any time using the Super User app.

The Handcent Group SMS plugin will allow you to send Group SMS messages to more people by circumventing your Android device\'s integrated limitation of 100 SMS messages per hour. Furthermore, those subscribing to Handcent VIP and GOLD memberships will enjoy greater functionality of the Group SMS plugin!
Currently installed Group SMS plugin: %s, actived plugins: \%%s, you may send max \%%s SMS every hour
Searching group SMS plugins from Google Play
Inserts a delay before sending your messages after you click SEND to grant you the option to halt sending and fix any errors you notice at the last moment.

This is an advance MMS feature that assists recipients in downloading pictures & videos that are of higher resolution than normal. This option only functions on supported devices with supported carriers.

Handcent Talk is an instant messaging service that utilizes the powerful Handcent Network to send and receive unlimited individual and group SMS and MMS messages absolutely free while enjoying 100% cross-platform support between Android and iPhone messaging features.
